title: How to get external contact joint torque in gazebo?

content.raw:
Could anyone give me an explanation how to get the contact joint torque in gazebo? 

After reading this: #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/1321/proper-joint-torque-feedback

And I am still confused about the functions of Joint::GetForceTorque() and Joint::GetForce(). Does one of them contain the contact joint torque from the external environment? Thanks!
content.html:
Could anyone give me an explanation how to get the contact joint torque in gazebo?

After reading this: #!/osrf/gazebo/issues/1321/proper-joint-torque-feedback
